user.title: SigenEnergy Gateway
user.description:
Connect to your SigenEnergy gateway to enable Modbus TCP.

Your gateway IP is typically on the sticker on the device or in your router's DHCP list.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect — check the IP address and port (default 8080).
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed — check your username and password.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. Enable debug logging for details.
